page.title: 06Todwick Garden Fete
page.content: Every July in Todwick there is a{fete held in the{rectory}garden. This year we were raising money for the Church Tower Appeal as Mr Froggat is our vicar and he organises it.We have stalls like the Pantry stall,The Tombola, The Sweet Stall with homemade sweets and a cake stall. There are also games like pillow fighting, croquet, putting marbles in a jar with a fork, Bran tub and hoopla. There was also donkey rides and a pony trap and a chance to beat the{Barnsley F.C. Reserve goal keeper. You had to guess how many balloons were in a car and the nearest guess won, also there were raffles,flower,Hot dog,material and balloon stalls. Refreshments were available and at the end there was an auction with ornaments and household goods you had to bid for. The Â£2000 raised was Â£300 more than the target.
